OOC: I'll be away until Tuesday.  If anyone needs to use my characters they 
can, just don't kill them off. Airly can control my Chivtrons.  Other than 
that I don't really care too much who controls them while I'm gone.  See you 
in a few days.

--part1_3c.196472e9.299f3920_boundary
